text: A day of the Lord is about to come when your possessions will be divided as plunder in your midst.

For I will gather all the nations against Jerusalem to wage war; the city will be taken, its houses plundered, and the women raped. Then half of the city will go into exile, but the remainder of the people will not be taken away.
Then the Lord will go to battle and fight against those nations, just as he fought battles in ancient days.

On <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> his <st data-num="07272" class="">feet</st> will <st data-num="05975" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> of <st data-num="02132" class="">Olives</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> lies <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="06440 06924">east</st> of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>, and the <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> of <st data-num="02132" class="">Olives</st> will be <st data-num="01234" class="">split</st> in <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st> from <st data-num="04217" class="">east</st> to <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st>, leaving a <st data-num="01419 03966">great</st> <st data-num="01516" class="">valley</st>. <st data-num="02677" class="">Half</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountain</st> will <st data-num="04185" class="">move</st> <st data-num="06828" class="">northward</st> and the other <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st> <st data-num="05045" class="">southward</st>.<n id="1" />

Then you will escape through my mountain valley, for the valley of the mountains will extend to Azal. Indeed, you will flee as you fled from the earthquake in the days of King Uzziah of Judah. Then the Lord my God will come with all his holy ones with him.

On <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> there will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="0216" class="">light</st>—the <st data-num="03368" class="">sources of light in the heavens</st> will <st data-num="07087" class="">congeal</st>.<n id="1" />
It will happen in one day—a day known to the Lord—not in the day or the night, but in the evening there will be light.
Moreover, on that day living waters will flow out from Jerusalem, half of them to the eastern sea and half of them to the western sea; it will happen both in summer and in winter.
The Lord will then be king over all the earth. In that day the Lord will be seen as one with a single name.

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> will <st data-num="05437" class="">change</st><n id="1" /> and become like the <st data-num="06160" class="">rift valley</st><n id="2" /> from <st data-num="01387" class="">Geba</st> to <st data-num="07417" class="">Rimmon</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st> of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>. Jerusalem will be <st data-num="07213" class="">raised up</st> and will <st data-num="03427" class="">stay</st> in its own <st data-num="08478" class="">place</st> from the <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">Gate</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04725" class="">site</st> of the <st data-num="07223" class="">First</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">Gate</st><n id="4" /> and on <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="06434" class="">Corner</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">Gate</st>,<n id="5" /> and from the <st data-num="04026" class="">Tower</st> of <st data-num="02606" class="">Hananel</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="03342" class="">winepresses</st>.<n id="6" />
And people will settle there, and there will no longer be the threat of divine extermination—Jerusalem will dwell in security.

But this will be the nature of the plague with which the Lord will strike all the nations that have fought against Jerusalem: Their flesh will decay while they stand on their feet, their eyes will rot away in their sockets, and their tongues will dissolve in their mouths.
On that day there will be great confusion from the Lord among them; they will seize each other and attack one another violently.

<st data-num="01571" class="">Moreover</st>, <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> will <st data-num="03898" class="">fight</st> at<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>, and the <st data-num="02428" class="">wealth</st> of <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05439" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> will be <st data-num="0622" class="">gathered up</st><n id="2" />—<st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>, <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>, and <st data-num="0899" class="">clothing</st> in <st data-num="03966" class="">great</st> <st data-num="07230" class="">abundance</st>.
This is the kind of plague that will devastate horses, mules, camels, donkeys, and all the other animals in those camps.
Then all who survive from all the nations that came to attack Jerusalem will go up annually to worship the King, the Lord of Heaven’s Armies, and to observe the Feast of Shelters.
But if any of the nations anywhere on earth refuse to go up to Jerusalem to worship the King, the Lord of Heaven’s Armies, they will get no rain.
If the Egyptians will not do so, they will get no rain—instead there will be the kind of plague that the Lord inflicts on any nations that do not go up to celebrate the Feast of Shelters.
This will be the punishment of Egypt and of all nations that do not go up to celebrate the Feast of Shelters.
On that day the bells of the horses will bear the inscription “Holy to the Lord.” The cooking pots in the Lord’s temple will be as holy as the bowls in front of the altar.

Every cooking pot in Jerusalem and Judah will become holy in the sight of the Lord of Heaven’s Armies, so that all who offer sacrifices may come and use some of them to boil their sacrifices in them. On that day there will no longer be a Canaanite in the house of the Lord of Heaven’s Armies.
